Package togepy :: Module gfx :: Class Particle
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class Particle

source code

object --+
         |
        Particle
Known Subclasses:
  • Particle2D

A point particle, as handled by a particle system. Should never be instantiated directly.

Method Details [hide private]

__init__(self, particle_system, slot, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Instantiates a particle. Any keyword arguments are set as attributes on the particle. For internal use only.

Overrides: object.__init__

tick(self)

source code 

Update this particle. To be overridden by subclasses. Should set self.dead to indicate the particle is no longer in use.


Class Variable Details [hide private]

defaultcolor

The default color for particles of this class. Defaults to white.

Value:
(1, 1, 1, 1)

size

The default point size for particles of this class. Defaults to one.

Value:
1
